attributes.action: give Major Phil Packer the honour of lighting the Olympic Flame at the London 2012 Olympics.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Major Phil Packer has given hope to many that have spinal injuries and has shown that their lives can go on with purpose. He is a fine example of a British serviceman who despite serious injuries is more concerned about what he can do for others. He is a role model that many can look to for inspiration. He is a true Hero. Therefore I propose that he carry the Olympic Flame to start the 2012 Olympics.

rejection.details: WE suggest you contact the British Olympic Association: http://www.olympics.org.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
